verses.verse: יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> There is רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> an evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> which I have seen תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun וְרַבָּ֥ה <WH7227> and it [is] common הִ֖יא <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> among הָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> among men

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> A man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to whom יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> hath given ל֣וֹ הָאֱלֹהִ֡ים <WH430> to whom God עֹשֶׁר֩ <WH6239> riches וּנְכָסִ֨ים <WH5233> wealth וְכָב֜וֹד <WH3519> and honour וְֽאֵינֶ֨נּוּ <WH369> nothing חָסֵ֥ר <WH2638> so that he wanteth לְנַפְשׁ֣וֹ ׀ <WH5315> nothing for his soul מִכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> of all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> to whom יִתְאַוֶּ֗ה <WH183> of all that he desireth וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not יַשְׁלִיטֶ֤נּוּ <WH7980> giveth him not power הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> yet God לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <WH398> to eat מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> A man נָכְרִ֖י <WH5237> A foreigner יֹֽאכֲלֶ֑נּוּ <WH398> eateth זֶ֥ה <WH2088> This הֶ֛בֶל <WH1892> it this [is] vanity וָחֳלִ֥י <WH2483> disease רָ֖ע <WH7451> and it [is] an evil הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

אִם־ <WH518> If יוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> beget אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> If a man מֵאָ֡ה <WH3967> an hundred וְשָׁנִים֩ <WH8141> years רַבּ֨וֹת <WH7227> many יִֽחְיֶ֜ה <WH2421> [children] and live וְרַ֣ב ׀ <WH7227> be many שֶׁיִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> have יְמֵֽי־ <WH3117> so that the days שָׁנָ֗יו <WH8141> of his years וְנַפְשׁוֹ֙ <WH5315> and his soul לֹא־ <WH3808> is not תִשְׂבַּ֣ע <WH7646> be not filled מִן־ <WH4480> than הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> with good וְגַם־ <WH1571> even קְבוּרָ֖ה <WH6900> and also [that] he have no burial לֹא־ <WH3808> not הָ֣יְתָה <WH1961> have לּ֑וֹ אָמַ֕רְתִּי <WH559> I say ט֥וֹב <WH2896> [is] better מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> than הַנָּֽפֶל׃ <WH5309> [that] an untimely birth

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> in בַהֶ֥בֶל <WH1892> in with vanity בָּ֖א <WH935> For he cometh וּבַחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> in darkness יֵלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> and goes וּבַחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <WH2822> with darkness שְׁמ֥וֹ <WH8034> and his name יְכֻסֶּֽה׃ <WH3680> shall be covered

גַּם־ <WH1571> again שֶׁ֥מֶשׁ <WH8121> the sun לֹא־ <WH3808> never רָאָ֖ה <WH7200> Moreover he hath not seen וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> never יָדָ֑ע <WH3045> nor known נַ֥חַת <WH5183> hath more rest לָזֶ֖ה <WH2088> [any thing] this מִזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> than

וְאִלּ֣וּ <WH432> Yea though חָיָ֗ה <WH2421> he live אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> a thousand שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> years פַּעֲמַ֔יִם <WH6471> twice וְטוֹבָ֖ה <WH2896> no good לֹ֣א <WH3808> not רָאָ֑ה <WH7200> [told] yet hath he seen הֲלֹ֛א <WH3808> not אֶל־ <WH413> about מָק֥וֹם <WH4725> country אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> to one הַכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> all manner הוֹלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> do not all go

כָּל־ <WH3605> All עֲמַ֥ל <WH5999> All the labour הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man לְפִ֑יהוּ <WH6310> [is] for his mouth וְגַם־ <WH1571> and yet הַנֶּ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> and yet the appetite לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not תִמָּלֵֽא׃ <WH4390> is not filled

כִּ֛י <WH3588> For מַה־ <WH4100> what יּוֹתֵ֥ר <WH3148> more לֶחָכָ֖ם <WH2450> For what hath the wise מִֽן־ <WH4480> have over הַכְּסִ֑יל <WH3684> foolish מַה־ <WH4100> what לֶּעָנִ֣י <WH6041> the poor יוֹדֵ֔עַ <WH3045> that knoweth לַהֲלֹ֖ךְ <WH1980> to walk נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> before הַחַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> age

ט֛וֹב <WH2896> Better מַרְאֵ֥ה <WH4758> [is] the sight עֵינַ֖יִם <WH5869> of the eyes מֵֽהֲלָךְ־ <WH1980> than the wandering נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> of the desire גַּם־ <WH1571> too זֶ֥ה <WH2088> This הֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> this [is] also vanity וּרְע֥וּת <WH7469> and vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> of spirit

מַה־ <WH4100> how long שֶּֽׁהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> exists כְּבָר֙ <WH3528> already נִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> bewray שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> and it וְנוֹדָ֖ע <WH3045> and it is known אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what ה֣וּא <WH1931> he אָדָ֑ם <WH120> that it [is] man וְלֹא־ <WH3808> neither יוּכַ֣ל <WH3201> neither may לָדִ֔ין <WH1777> he contend עִ֥ם <WH5973> with [שֶׁהַתְקִיף כ] (שֶׁתַּקִּ֖יף <WH8630> prevail ק) מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> than

כִּ֛י <WH3588> For יֵשׁ־ <WH3426> Seeing there be דְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> things הַרְבֵּ֖ה <WH7235> many מַרְבִּ֣ים <WH7235> that increase הָ֑בֶל <WH1892> vanity מַה־ <WH4100> What יֹּתֵ֖ר <WH3148> is the advantage לָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> what [is] man

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For מִֽי־ <WH4310> who יוֹדֵעַ֩ <WH3045> For who knoweth מַה־ <WH4100> what טּ֨וֹב <WH2896> what [is] good לָֽאָדָ֜ם <WH120> for man בַּֽחַיִּ֗ים <WH2416> in [this] life מִסְפַּ֛ר <WH4557> all יְמֵי־ <WH3117> the days חַיֵּ֥י <WH2416> life הֶבְל֖וֹ <WH1892> of his vain וְיַעֲשֵׂ֣ם <WH6213> which he spendeth כַּצֵּ֑ל <WH6738> A shadow אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who מִֽי־ <WH4310> for יַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> tell לָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> a man מַה־ <WH4100> what יִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become אַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> what shall be after תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> east side
